sentences: Christian Älvestam (Born 14 April 1976 in Sweden) is a vocalist, lyricist, guitarist, bassist and drummer for several bands from Sweden.
He currently performs with several bands, including Solution .45, Miseration, Cipher System, Svavelvinter, Ill-Wisher, Pre-Human Vaults and has made several guest appearances for other music bands.
Henrik B – Clean vocals on the track “Now and Forever”.
Lowbringer – Clean vocals, guitar, drums, and programming on the track "Planting a New Sun"
